thread.title: What's new on Netflix in October? 53 movies, TV shows streaming this month
thread.title_full: What's new on Netflix in October? 53 movies, TV shows streaming this month | syracuse.com

author: Geoff Herbert | gherbert@syracuse.com
title: What's new on Netflix in October? 53 movies, TV shows streaming this month
text:
What's new on Netflix in October? The days are getting shorter and colder, which means more "Netflix and chill" time.
At the beginning of the month, the streaming service will have a bunch of new movies, including "Million Dollar Baby," Robert Duvall's "Wild Horses," and Johnny Depp and Tim Burton's "Charlie and the Chocolate Factory." If you're a home improvement fan, TV shows include "Extreme homes," "House Hunters Renovation," "Million Dollar Rooms," "Fixer Upper," and "The Vanilla Ice Project."
If you need to catch on television series this fall, Netflix is adding season 6 of "The Vampire Diaries" (Oct. 2), season 1 of "iZombie" (Oct. 6), season 1 of "The Flash" (Oct. 6), season 3 of "Arrow" (Oct. 7), season 10 of "Supernatural" (Oct. 7) and season 1 of "Jane the Virgin" (Oct. 12).
For the kids, Netflix Originals this month include " The Mr. Peabody and Sherman Show " (Oct. 9), featuring time traveling adventures through history and music by Syracuse-based band Ra Ra Riot ; season 2 of "Madagascar" spinoff "All Hail King Julien" (Oct. 16); and a reboot of "Popples," based on the '80s cuddly creatures that can roll up into a ball.
And because Halloween is coming up, by Oct. 31 you'll be able to watch "Curse of Chucky," Olivia Wilde in "The Lazarus Effect," the "Manson Family Vacation" and the final season of "Hemlock Grove."
New on Netflix in October 2015:

Million Dollar Baby
Wild Horses
